sentences.cn: 所有的话都是来歌颂你的.

sentences.en: Grind to Dust : Troll strikes a single player for roughly 500 damage.
sentences.cn: 粉碎: 巨魔攻击单个的玩家,造成大概500点伤害.

sentences.en: How much fish did you troll yesterday?
sentences.cn: 昨天钩了多少鱼 啊 ?

sentences.en: Ice trolls are a subspecies of troll that lives in cold climates.
sentences.cn: 冰霜巨魔是一种生活在寒冷气候中的巨魔亚种.

sentences.en: Permanent buff, increases damage to 150 % and sets troll to confused state.
sentences.cn: 永久性增益, 增加伤害到150%,并且使巨魔处于困惑状态.

sentences.en: Price of Forest Troll Shadow Priest changed from 155 to 200.
sentences.cn: 树魔影子牧师的价格从155调整为200.

sentences.en: Ships towing huge magnets trolled the ocean floor.
sentences.cn: 船只拖着巨大的磁石在海底进行拖捞作业。

sentences.en: The troll clambered to his feet, laughing and retrieved his stick.
sentences.cn: 这矮人从地上爬起来, 大笑着,重新拿起他拄的棍子.

sentences.en: The Troll Commander , Zuljin , is captured at Hillsbrad.
sentences.cn: 巨魔领袖祖金被关押在希尔斯布莱德.

sentences.en: The young man and the troll climbed up to perch on top.
sentences.cn: 这少年和这矮人爬上大石,在上面坐了下来.

sentences.en: These words come from the old Troll language , from the ancient times.
sentences.cn: 并且您也决不会到那里去, 即使是您Lyllkrank先生.

sentences.en: Three Blind Mice is a well - known troll.
sentences.cn: 三只瞎老鼠是一首著名的轮唱歌曲.

sentences.en: Troll Female - " I feel pretty, oh so pretty ( spit ) . "
sentences.cn: 我真淑女, 噢~真 淑女. 哈- 呸.

sentences.en: Troll Female - " I got all this and personality, too . "
sentences.cn: 我很有个性, 你觉得 呢?

sentences.en: Troll Female -'strong halitosis be but one of my feminine traits. "
sentences.cn: 强烈的 口臭,是我的魅力所在.

sentences.en: Troll's exclusive, personalized luggage is made to our own exacting specifications in heavy-duty PVC/nylon.
sentences.cn: 特罗尔专用的、个性化的行李箱是按照我们自己严格的规格要求用耐用聚氯乙烯/尼龙材料定制的。

words.tran_cn: [船][水产] 曳绳钓渔船；拖钩渔船；小钓船
轮唱，使转动；放声高唱；拖饵钓鱼

trans.tran_cn: 旋转，轮唱，钓鱼，侏儒，山怪
（使）旋转，合唱中的轮唱，放声高唱，钓（鱼）
trans.tran_en: to try to remove something from a river, ocean etc by pulling a rope, line etc through the water
